live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We are working to restore services. We estimate your service will be restored by 4:10pm, Please stay tuned for updates.
36453.summary: Some customers in the South Tuxedo & Tuxedo Industrial areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36453.title: Apr 18 – Winnipeg (South Tuxedo & Tuxedo Industrial) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
